content: आपात {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Rushing upon, attacking. --तः {@--1@} Rushing or falling upon, attack, descending, alighting; तदापातभयात्पथि <ls>Ku. 2. 45</ls>; गरुडापातविश्लिष्टमेघनादास्त्रबंधनः <ls>R. 12. 76.</ls> {@--2@} Throwing down. {@--3@} Causing to descend or fall, falling down; धारापातैः <ls>Me. 48.</ls> {@--4@} ({%a%}) The present or current moment, the instant; आपातरम्या विषयाः पर्यंतपरितापिनः <ls>Ki. 11. 12</ls>, आपतसुरसे भोगे निमग्नाः किं न कुर्वते <ls>S. D.</ls>; <ls>H. 4. 75</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 115</ls>; <ls>Māl. 5.</ls> ({%b%}) (Hence) First sight or appearance; see आपाततः {@--5@} Happening, becoming apparent, appearance.
